p: This coronavirus pandemic has posed a great threat to mankind and worldwide more than 29 lakh people have been affected by this viral disease and the numbers are still increasing every day. Therefore, it is the need of the hour, for rapid diagnosis and constant surveillance as well as social distancing to halt the progression of this deadly virus spread in the near future especially in developing countries where there are insufficient medical facilities and personnel as well as promote pool testing which is more cost-effective approach. It is vital to understand the biology of this virus so that vaccine or treatment strategies can be developed at the earliest so that further community spread is averted.
